tags.name: Songs
tags.description: Manage songs stored in the database

get.summary: Searches for users containing a given input string
get.description: Searches for users containing a given input string

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: A string to search for within the user

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

put.summary: Creates a new user. Email must be unique

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the user

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the user

parameters.name: countryName
parameters.description: The country of the user

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the user

get.summary: Gets the newest users in the database by page
get.description: Gets the newest users in the database by page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

post.summary: Modifies a user with a given action
post.description: Set email, maxDontPlay, maxMustPlay, Activate, Deactivate, set statusEnd, set Ambassador, set DJ, or set Support

parameters.name: emailOrId
parameters.description: The email or id of the user to update

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Select an action

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: Enter a new value - this field will be ignored if not applicable

post.summary: Updates multiop users and their children
post.description: Adds or removes DJs from a multiop user or creates a multiop user from a DJ.

parameters.name: emailOrId
parameters.description: The email or id of the user to update

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Select an action

parameters.name: DJs
parameters.description: A list of DJs to be added or removed

get.summary: Gets the most popular songs in the database by page
get.description: Gets the most popular songs in the database by page.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.summary: Gets the first song with the given YouTube id or url
get.description: Gets the first song with the given YouTube id or url

parameters.name: youtubeId
parameters.description: The YouTube id or url of the song

post.summary: Replaces a YouTube video with another YouTube Video
post.description: Replaces a YouTube video with another YouTube Video

parameters.name: youtubeId
parameters.description: The YouTube id or url of the song to be updated

parameters.name: newYoutubeId
parameters.description: The new YouTube id or url - Leave blank if not updating

parameters.name: songName
parameters.description: The new name of the song

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: The new artist of the song

put.summary: Adds a new YouTube video into the database
put.description: Adds a new YouTube video into the database

parameters.name: youtubeId
parameters.description: The YouTube id or url of the song to be added

parameters.name: songName
parameters.description: The name of the song - If blank, the name and artist will be set automatically

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: The artist of the song - If blank, the name and artist will be set automatically

get.summary: Searches for existing events that contain a given string in the title
get.description: Searches for existing events that contain a given string in the title

parameters.name: searchString
parameters.description: A string that the title contains

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.summary: Gets the newest events in the database by page
get.description: Gets the newest events in the database by page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of results to return

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

post.summary: Adds or removes attendees from the guests or hosts of an event
post.description: Adds or removes attendees from the guests or hosts of an event

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The id of the event

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Select an action

parameters.name: attendees
parameters.description: A list of attendees to be removed

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: The id of the event

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Select an action
